pages.title: King baboon Spider
pages.text: Pelinobius or the king baboon is a monotypic genus of east African tarantulas containing the single species, Pelinobius muticus.$(br2)It was first described by Ferdinand Anton Franz Karsch in 1885, and is found in Tanzania and Kenya.

pages.title: King baboon Spider
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
